column4: hello! i have an usb pen with a "failed" ubuntu installation. when that pen is connected to the computer booting dont go beyond motherboard logo. how do i "erase" the pen?
you can easily erase and rebuild your ubuntu pen with Startup Disk Creator (default installed)
by the way, is it posible to build from a windows iso a booting pen drive of windows installation from ubuntu?
, thanks , procedure wasn t very clear but i guess it worked
